PDF Classes¶

PDF¶

class SurveyManager.utility.PdfGeneration.PDF¶

This class is responsible for creating PDFs for reports.

Public Static Functions

static void CreateDocument (string filename, string title, string author, string subject, string headerString, Fonts documentFont, bool includeHeader = true, bool includeFooter = true, bool landscape = false, int fontSize = 11, bool stream = false)¶

Create a new PDF Document with the specified information.

This should be called before any Generation methods in this class as it sets up variables relevant to the next Generate method call.

Param filename

The file name of the new PDF document.

Param title

The title (for metadata) of the new PDF document.

Param author

The author (for metadata) of the new PDF document.

Param subject

The subject (for metadata) of the new PDF document.

Param headerString

The text for the header.

Param documentFont

The font family to use for this new PDF document. See Fonts for valid options.

Param fontSize

The normal font size for the text in this new PDF document. Default is 11. The header font size will be this font size plus 4.

Param stream

Should the new document be created as a MemoryStream instead of a file? Default is false.

static MemoryStream GenerateBillingReport (Survey s)¶

Generate a PDF billing report.

Param s

The Survey to generate the report for.

Return

If CreateDocument(string, string, string, string, string, Fonts, bool, bool, bool, int, bool) was called with isStream as true, returns a MemoryStream object to this PDF. Otherwise, returns null.

static MemoryStream GenerateFullReport (Survey s)¶

Generate a PDF full report for a survey.

Param s

The Survey to generate the report for.

Return

If CreateDocument(string, string, string, string, string, Fonts, bool, bool, bool, int, bool) was called with isStream as true, returns a MemoryStream object to this PDF. Otherwise, returns null.

static MemoryStream GenerateFileReport (Survey s)¶

Generate a PDF file report.

Param s

The Survey to generate the report for.

Return

If CreateDocument(string, string, string, string, string, Fonts, bool, bool, bool, int, bool) was called with isStream as true, returns a MemoryStream object to this PDF. Otherwise, returns null.

static void DrawString (string text, float x, bool updateCurrentY = true)¶

Draw a string to the page at the specified x-position.

Param text

The text to draw.

Param x

The x-position to start drawing the string at.

Param updateCurrentY

Should this method update the current y-position variable after drawing?

static SizeF DrawStringPair (string title, string description, float x, bool updateCurrentY = true)¶

Draw a string pair with a bolded title and normal description on the same line.

Param title

The title text to draw.

Param description

The description text to draw.

Param x

The starting x position to draw the two strings at.

Param updateCurrentY

Should this method update the current y-position variable after drawing?

Return

The SizeF of the new string pair.

static void DrawStringLine (Pair<string, string> left, bool leftIsPair, Pair<string, string> right, bool rightIsPair, bool updateCurrentY)¶

Draw two text pairs, one left aligned and one right aligned. The strings to draw are specified by the Pair<K, V> parameters.

A pair can be any two strings; i.e. “Customer ID:” and “Test Customer”. To draw the text, this method needs to know if the left and right text should be considered as pairs. This means that the Key of the Pair<K, V> will be drawn bolded while the Value will be drawn using the regular text font.

You should also specify whether the current y-position should be updated after execution of this method.

Param left

The text to draw left aligned.

Param leftIsPair

Is the left text considered a pair?

Param right

The text to draw right aligned.

Param rightIsPair

Is the right text considered a pair?

Param updateCurrentY

Should this method update the value of the current y-position?

static float UpdateCurrentY (string lastLineText, bool wasBolded, bool usingHeaderFont = false)¶

Updates the y-position using the last line of text and the specified parameters.

Param lastLineText

The last line of text drawn.

Param wasBolded

Was the text drawn with the bold font?

Param usingHeaderFont

Was the text draw with the header font?

Return

The new currentY position.
